description: The webhook payload for the porting_order.new_comment event

porting_order_id.description: Identifies the porting order that the comment was added to.

support_key.description: Identifies the support key associated with the porting order.

comment.description: The comment that was added to the porting order.

user_id.description: Identifies the user that create the comment.

user_type.description: Identifies the type of the user that created the comment.

inserted_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the comment was created.
